tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE deep_learning_performance_metrics (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    training_duration INTERVAL,
    validation_loss DECIMAL,
    validation_accuracy DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE deep_learning_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(255),
    framework VARCHAR(100),
    accuracy DECIMAL(5,2),
    training_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE model_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT REFERENCES deep_learning_models(model_id),
    loss DECIMAL(5,2),
    precision DECIMAL(5,2),
    recall DECIMAL(5,2),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE deep_learning_model_metrics (
    model_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name STRING,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    validation_loss FLOAT,
    training_accuracy FLOAT,
    validation_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE training_data_metrics (
    data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    data_name STRING,
    data_type STRING,
    data_size INT,
    training_time FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE optimization_metrics (
    optimization_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id UUID REFERENCES deep_learning_model_metrics(model_id),
    training_data_id UUID REFERENCES training_data_metrics(data_id),
    optimization_time FLOAT,
    optimization_iterations INT
);

CREATE TABLE training_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    training_epoch INT,
    training_loss FLOAT,
    training_accuracy FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE optimization_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    optimization_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    optimizer VARCHAR(50),
    learning_rate FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE deep_learning_models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    framework VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    architecture VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    training_loss DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    validation_loss DOUBLE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE training_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    epoch_number INT NOT NULL,
    training_accuracy DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    training_loss DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    learning_rate DOUBLE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE validation_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    epoch_number INT NOT NULL,
    validation_accuracy DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    validation_loss DOUBLE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE hardware_resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    gpu_count INT NOT NULL,
    memory_capacity DOUBLE NOT NULL,
    processor_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE execution_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    execution_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);
